title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. The tab key does not do anything when navigating through the Help view.
OB: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not do anything.
EB: The Help view should be starting in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
SR: 1. Launch the Help view. 2. Observe that the tab key does not do anything. 3. Click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame). 4. Observe that the Help view starts working and the tab key now navigates through the Help view.
